description: A creamy cake with a deliciously soft sponge with the fresh taste of banana.
name: Banana & Panettone Ice Cream Cake Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Get a suitable size bowl that is suitable for freezing also.
Lightly sprinkle some water around the inside of the bowl and then cover the entire inside of the bowl with cling film.
Place the sliced pannetone at the base of the bowl and around the edges, keeping some aside for the top.
Now layer the ice cream with the mashed banana through the center in whichever style you would like.
Now push the ingredients down hard and cover the top with the rest of the pannetone.
Now cover the top with cling film and freeze for 3 hours before serving with whipped cream.
